info.author: Object Craft
info.description:
Albatross is a small and flexible  Python toolkit for developing highly stateful
web applications. The toolkit has been designed to take a lot of the pain out of
constructing intranet applications although you can also use Albatross for
deploying publicly accessed web applications.
info.name: albatross
info.summary: Albatross is a toolkit for developing highly stateful web applications.
info.html_description: Albatross is a small and flexible Python toolkit for developing highly stateful web applications. The toolkit has been designed to take a lot of the pain out of constructing intranet applications although you can also use Albatross for deploying publicly accessed web applications.
